title: 2019 NFL Wardrobe Review
itunes:title: 2019 NFL Wardrobe Review
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Handsome Hank! Hank first talks about the pickles that were gifted to all of DDFP but he ended up consuming most of them alone (3:49). Next, the duo talks about the NFL finalizing the pass interference penalty which allows coaches to challenge them up until the two minute warning or overtime (7:02). With news of the Tampa Bay Rays splitting time between Florida and Montreal, Shek and Hank discuss what that would be like for an NFL franchise (17:29). Then, the guys kibitz about great television shows they've been watching lately such as Barry and Chernobyl (26:28). Finally they round out the show ranking their best and worst NFL uniforms of 2019 (44:04).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
